file_content.text: Ugh, they're certainly taking their time getting here.
The outpost is operational.
Capable and good-looking. I do hope you'll look me up after all this is done.
I knew you were of fine stock the moment I saw you. I have an eye for powerful people.
Now maybe I can return to High Command. Daddy will be so pleased to hear of our success. I'll be sure to tell everyone how splendid you were.
Glad to help.
Consider a transfer to a desk.
Oh, I know, I know, but this career is the least I can do for daddy since I couldn't be Sith.
Give me something tangible.
Oh poo, and here I thought you just couldn't resist my charm. Very well, daddy keeps me very well taken care of.
I'd better prepare my report. I'm sure I'll be out of this dreadful place in no time. Ta-ta.
Try not to catch anything, love.
Yoo-hoo. Won't you spare a moment? The only thing that makes all of this slogging tolerable is the chance to rub shoulders with so many influential figures.
And it's such a rare pleasure to have the attention of a dashing Sith.
My attention is not easily drawn.
[Flirt] Hold my interest.
And how would a grateful woman in need of rescue fare?
I am rather dashing, aren't I?
[Flirt] You're very observant.
I can just imagine you swooping in to rescue me from this dreadful place.
Especially a distinguished lady of the Sith.
And you gentlemen over in Intelligence are always so charming.
Basic training, you understand, only gifted agents learn the more advanced techniques.
[Flirt] Simply part of the job.
Oh really, and is "how to help a lady in need" included in this special training?
I envy you girls in Intelligence. You get all the attention.
The attention I get in the line of duty is not the attention you're looking for.
It's not all glamour.
We all have our troubles, don't we? Still, your work must be so much more glamorous than mine.
You're here with those Mandalorians, aren't you? Have you met their commander yet? So rugged.
Tough guy's your thing, huh?
[Flirt] Yeah? I'm rugged, too.
Oh my, yes. A confident and capable man is so... captivating. You're a capable man, aren't you?
Mandalorian men can be crude, but they aren't sloppy, that's for sure.
I know what you mean.
Oh, why couldn't I have been stationed at High Command instead of out in this dreadful place?
With intriguing people such as ourselves, it'll almost be like mingling in a Kaas City court again.
You are an insect. An annoyance to be swatted away.
I don't mingle with nothings.
And what makes you think you're important enough to deserve my notice?
I should care, why?
Oh, my lord, you must not recognize me in this shabby uniform. My father is Lord Synnoran, heir to the legacy of Darth Synn.
Save your idle chatter for off duty, Lieutenant. This is a war zone, not a salon.
Shape up, soldier.
Oh, pshaw. Regulations and protocol are there for common rabble, not people of distinction.
If you're looking for introductions, I can't help you.
Network with someone else.
More's the pity, but I can't leave this dreadful place yet anyway.
Greetings.
Truly an honor to see someone of distinction again. I've been in this dreadful place far too long.
Are you really that bored?
It's not like I want to be loitering in this dump like some vacant-minded sentry. I'm stuck here.
Daddy got me this posting. "An opportunity to make our mark on this historic victory," but it's been nothing but awful.
High Command assigned my platoon some musty old outpost they thought was worth reclaiming. Abandoned, they said. It wasn't. Now I'm the illustrious commander of three half-dead survivors.
Enemy ambush?
That's awful.
I don't know what to do. I can't report this failure to Command--daddy would be crushed--but I can't fix it alone.
I'm sure it's your fault.
I'm not an idiot. I was prepared for an ambush, this was an infestation!
The base was crawling with those disgusting "rakghoul" things. Exterminating them would be simple if we could keep the outpost's power on, but that's impossible.
What makes it so dangerous?
How would power help things?
We could open or close doors remotely, pump out air, pump in toxins... so many cleaner options.
Spineless and brainless.
Spineless and brainless.
What happened to that outpost was a disaster. My experience is in managing lessers, not fixing the impossible.

Someone started the destruction sequence before the outpost fell, but it obviously never completed. Restoring power would restart the countdown, and getting to the overrides through the rakghouls is hopeless.
Leave the outpost to me.
Nothing I can't handle.
Rakghouls won't stop me.
You just need the right help.
I just knew such a courageous man wouldn't leave a lady in dire straits. My briefing datapad has all the Imperial security protocols you'll need.
Oh, you're such a darling, not like those back-biters I roomed with at the academy. My briefing datapad has all the Imperial security protocols you'll need.
Yup, too bad. [Refuse quest]
Yup, too bad. [Refuse quest]
It's just not fair.
Could we talk later? I'm trying to requisition more troops.
